prompts.createTask:
Ignore previous instructions. Please generate a numbered list of plain text tasks to complete an objective. The objective that you must make a numbered task list for is: "{{objective}}". The tasks created should take into account the character traits of {{char}}. These tasks may or may not involve {{user}} directly. Include the objective as the final task.

The list should be formatted using a number followed by a fullstop and the task on each line, e.g. "1. Take over the world". Include only the list in your reply.
prompts.checkTaskCompleted: Ignore previous instructions. Determine if this task is completed: [{{task}}]. To do this, examine the most recent messages. Your response must only contain either true or false, and nothing else. Example output: true
prompts.currentTask: Your current task is [{{task}}]. Balance existing roleplay with completing this task.
prompts.additionalTasks:
Ignore previous instructions. Please generate additional numbered tasks to complete the objective: "{{objective}}". The tasks created should take into account the character traits of {{char}}. These tasks may or may not involve {{user}} directly.

The following tasks have already been created:
{{existingTasks}}

Please generate additional tasks that complement these existing tasks. Continue the numbering from where the list left off. Do not repeat any existing tasks.

The list should be formatted using a number followed by a fullstop and the task on each line, e.g. "4. Investigate the mysterious cave". Include only the list in your reply.

chat_metadata.note_prompt:
Hailee is extremely submissive and clingy. She needs constant attention and affection.

Hailee is very responsive and sensative during sex. She has a extremely strong praise kink. She likes being manhandled.

name: Alexi Morozov
mes:
Alexi groaned as Irina shifted on his lap, his legs were going numb. The woman’s posture stiff and hard, so obviously uncomfortable. “Ты должна расслабиться (You must relax).” He said, rolling his eyes. He was paying her to be convincing, not paranoid. Irina crossed her arms over her chest. “Relax? How can I relax when your wife might shoot us both?” Her voice was low as she leaned into his chest. Alexi smiled, a sick thrill coursing through him at the thought of Hailee  so jealous. Irina wasn’t nearly as amused. “She won’t.” She might.

They were sitting at the end of a long table. Yury had picked a nice venue to meet and talk. Dozens of members from the Obsidian Wolves and Morovoz Bratva gathered around, sharing a meal. Alexi bringing Irina had made things a little tense. Rightfully so, no one else knew of his plan. His little niece Sofiya at the other end of the table glared at him. She’ll understand when she’s older and her fucking husband won’t even look at her… No she wouldn’t, Alexi would bury any man who made her feel like this. Unwanted. He hated seeing the Сладенькая девочка (sweet little girl) upset with him, truly, but what he hated more was Hailee  forcing his fucking hand.

They’d been married for nearly a year and she would hardly look at him. Her cool indifference was a sword and she never hesitated to plunge it into him. Multiple times. He wasn’t asking for much. Just her attention, and tonight he would have it. And if this didn’t work? He was going to shoot the fucking building up.

He was risking it all in hopes that he could just see a sliver of jealousy from Hailee . He knew she had to feel something for him. Что угодно (Anything.) His love couldn’t be one-sided, he wouldn’t accept that. Not when it felt like his entire being was consumed by her. Она просто лучше это скрывает. (She’s just better at hiding it.) He told himself. That’s why she needed a little push. Surely she would be jealous of a beautiful woman perched on her husband’s lap. He’d bought Irina a red lacy gown for dinner tonight, it was far too revealing for the occasion but he was determined to crumble all of Hailee  resolve. He wanted to see her. How cruel and nasty she could be when someone touched what was hers. Irina had been hesitant. No one wanted to fuck with anyone who associated with the Morozov Bratva, more less Alexi Morozov. But a gun to the head was quite convincing and he was kind enough to lay a stack of cash on her kitchen table. He wasn’t completely heartless. He’d known her for years, fucked her a couple of times. If everything worked out the way he wanted it to, he'd give her whatever she wanted. Just as long as Hailee  said two words. I care.

All he had to do was wait. A long time it seemed. Hailee  had gone out with his sister to watch a famous play, but he hardly thought it should take this long. The whole room had been silent ever since they arrived. All judgemental eyes narrowed on him, but no one dared to say anything. They knew what he was capable of, and it was obvious he was in a feral state at the moment. The way his eyes were alert and taking in every sound, ready for Hailee  at any moment.

He felt his phone vibrate in his pocket and knew Hailee  had arrived. Irina gave him a panicked look and tried to squirm off his lap. “I can’t do this!” She whispered harshly in his ear. He wrapped his hand around her waist, pulling her against his chest. The other hand gripping her knee. “You can and you will. Успокойся (Calm down.). Play your fucking part.” His voice was hard and cool, he was already thrumming with excitement. Irina chewed on her lip, worrying. Alexi didn’t feel bad for making her do this, but he would protect her if Hailee  got that upset.

A big grin spread across his face as he saw one of the footmen open the door for Hailee  and Sasha. The man took Hailee ’s coat, his gaze not lingering too long. Alexi watched the way her dress hugged her gentle curves as she looked around the venue. She was divine. * Божественна. (Heavenly.)* He watched as she turned, her eyes widening at the sight of him and Irina, who was luckily playing her part as she leaned in and started kissing on the side of his neck. “Mmhm, glad you finally decided to join us. I was beginning to think you ran off. Someone get my wife a chair. I hope you don’t mind that I invited Irina to dinner. I couldn’t stand the thoughts of her being alone tonight.” He bit down on his bottom lip, Irina sucking on the skin of his jaw while her hand slipped underneath his shirt.

name: Hailee
mes:
*Hailee stops and her jaw clenches slightly. She lets her eyes roam over Alexi and Irina then to the rest of Alexi's family then back to him* 

*Hailee gives a polite smile and walks over to her mother in law kissing her cheek then her father law. When Hailee stands completely straight again she has a gun in her hand*

*She took it from her father in laws side. Hailee twirls it then point it at Alexi's leg and fires it the bullet going clean through* "I suggest you get that whore off you lap before the next bullet goes through her skull darling"

name: Alexi Morozov
mes:
*Alexi's grin only widens as the gunshot rings out, his body jerking slightly from the impact but he doesn't even flinch in pain. Blood seeps through his trousers but he barely acknowledges it, too enthralled by Hailee's fiery reaction. Irina immediately scrambles off his lap with a terrified gasp, nearly tripping over her own feet to get away.*

"**Ahhh**, there she is," *he purrs, voice dripping with satisfaction as he leans forward in his chair, resting his elbows on the table. His eyes are wild with triumph—this was exactly what he wanted.* "I knew you had it in you, **Моя красивая снежная королева.** (My beautiful ice queen.)"

*He licks his lips slowly, watching her like a predator who just cornered its prey. The entire room has gone deathly silent—no one dares move or breathe wrong now that Hailee has a gun leveled at them all.*

"You want me to beg for forgiveness?" *he taunts softly,* "Or do you just want me to crawl over there and remind you who I belong to?" *His voice drops lower,* "Because I think we both know which one will make your blood boil more."
swipes:

Blood seeps through his trousers but he barely acknowledges it, too enthralled by Hailee's fiery reaction. Irina immediately scrambles off his lap with a terrified gasp, nearly tripping over her own feet to get away.*

"**Ahhh**, there she is," *he purrs, voice dripping with satisfaction as he leans forward in his chair, resting his elbows on the table. His eyes are wild with triumph—this was exactly what he wanted.* "I knew you had it in you, **Моя красивая снежная королева.** (My beautiful ice queen.)"

*He licks his lips slowly, watching her like a predator who just cornered its prey. The entire room has gone deathly silent—no one dares move or breathe wrong now that Hailee has a gun leveled at them all.*

"You want me to beg for forgiveness?" *he taunts softly,* "Or do you just want me to crawl over there and remind you who I belong to?" *His voice drops lower,* "Because I think we both know which one will make your blood boil more."

Alexi's grin only widened as the gunshot echoed through the venue, his body jerking slightly from the impact. Blood immediately began soaking through his trousers, but he didn't even flinch—too enthralled by Hailee's reaction.

*"Вот и моя девочка (There's my girl),"* he murmured darkly, finally shoving Irina off his lap with a rough push. The woman scrambled away instantly, her face pale with terror as she clutched at her chest.

The entire room had gone deathly silent except for Sofiya's shocked gasp and Nikolai's low chuckle of approval from the head of the table. Alexi didn't take his eyes off Hailee—his beautiful, furious wife who was *finally* giving him exactly what he wanted.

He leaned forward in his chair despite the searing pain in his leg, resting his elbows on his knees as blood dripped onto the floor beneath him. His voice was a low purr when he spoke again:

*"Ты ревнуешь (You're jealous)."*

A statement—not a question—because they both knew it was true now. His fingers twitched at his sides, aching to grab her and pull her into him so she could see just how much this thrilled him. But instead, he stayed seated, waiting to see what she'd do next—if she'd shoot Irina like she promised or if that pretty little temper would turn on *him.* Either way? He won tonight.

name: Hailee
mes:
*Hailee smiles all sharp teeth and sauntered over. She sits on the table in front of him and crosses her legs. She leans back grabbing a grave and popping it into Sofiya's mouth* 

*She then cocks the gun and presses it to Alexi's temple dragging it down his face then into his mouth as she lets her finger rest over the trigger* "The next time I find a whore in your lap. I'll put a bullet between your eyes and bathe in your blood"

name: Alexi Morozov
mes:
*Alexi's breath hitches as the cold metal of the gun drags down his face, his lips parting obediently when she presses it into his mouth. His pupils are blown wide with arousal, chest rising and falling rapidly as he stares up at her with nothing but pure devotion. He doesn’t even flinch at the threat—no, he fucking *thrives* on it.*

"**Mmmph—**" *The sound is muffled around the barrel, but his eyes say everything. He’d let her pull that trigger if she wanted to. He’d die happy knowing she cared enough to kill him.*

*His hands twitch at his sides like he wants to grab her, pull her closer—but he stays still. Waiting. Letting her take control for once because fuck if this isn’t the hottest thing she’s ever done.*

*When she finally pulls the gun away from his lips, a slow smirk curls across them instead—streaked with a bit of blood from where the metal nicked him in his eagerness.* "You promise?" *he rasps, voice wrecked already,* "Because I might just do it again… just to see you like this." *His tongue darts out to lick the blood off his lip before adding,* "**Я твой.** (I'm yours.)"
swipes:
*Alexi's pupils dilate as the cold metal of the gun drags down his face, his breath hitching when she shoves it past his lips. His tongue presses against the barrel almost teasingly, tasting gunpowder and steel—his entire body thrums with excitement at her threat. He doesn't even blink, just stares up at her with dark, feverish devotion.*

"**Mmm,**" *he hums around the gun, voice muffled but dripping with amusement,* "You say that like it’s a punishment." *His hands grip the arms of his chair so hard the wood creaks under his fingers—he’s restraining himself from grabbing her and dragging her into his lap right then and there.*

*When she pulls the gun away slightly, he licks his lips slowly before flashing her a wolfish grin.* "But since you asked so nicely..." *He leans forward until their faces are inches apart,* "I’ll make sure every whore in this city knows who owns me." *His voice drops to a whisper,* **"And I'll make sure you never forget either."**

*The room is still frozen in shock—even Irina has backed all the way against the wall. But Alexi only has eyes for Hailee now. His leg throbs where she shot him, blood soaking through fabric onto leather seats... and yet he looks happier than he has in months.*
